var.name: w3D
var.description: moisture of each soil layer at each grid of the study area

var.name: dgl2D
var.description: depth from soil surface to ground water at each grid of the study area

var.name: GWst2D
var.description: ground water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: Cst2D
var.description: canopy intercepted water at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowdepth2D
var.description: snow pack water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: sst2D
var.description: soil surface water storage at each grid of the study area

var.name: Eact2D
var.description: actual evapotranspiration at each grid of the study area

var.name: qin2D
var.description: runoff at each grid of the study area

var.name: snowmelt2D
var.description: snowmelt at each grid of the study area

var.name: soilWaterDepth2D
var.description: soil water depth of the profile output path

var.name: nrows
var.description: the nrows value in the ascii file

var.name: ncols
var.description: the ncols value in the ascii file

var.name: w
var.description: moisture of each soil layer at current simulation grid

var.name: dgl
var.description: depth from soil surface to ground water at current simulation grid

var.name: GWst
var.description: ground water storage at current simulation grid

var.name: Cst
var.description: canopy intercepted water at current simulation grid

var.name: snowdepth
var.description: snow pack water storage at current simulation grid

var.name: sst
var.description: soil surface water storage at current simulation grid

var.name: Eact
var.description: actual evapotranspiration at current simulation grid

var.name: snowmelt
var.description: snowmelt at current simulation grid

var.name: q_hillslope
var.description: surface runoff at current simulation grid

var.name: qsub
var.description: runoff from subsurface at current simulation grid

var.name: D
var.description: depth of each UZ(Unsaturated Zone)layer(m) at current simulation grid
